title: what level do you unlock the matery emote and banner thing when loading?
body: what level do you unlock the matery emote and banner thing when loading? i have lv 4 lv matery and when i try to flash emote it dont work and says not unclocked. how i unlock it?

replies.body:
All of the [**mastery rewards**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284#h2q1) start unlocking at mastery level 4! You should be able to flash that emote by hitting ctrl+6, but if that doesn't work double check what is currently bound to Mastery Emote in your client option hotkeys under communication!

https://i.gyazo.com/6a1bc91bc72f0a1596d5d7ab15f0aee6.png
